title: Peeps For Pets
problem: Pets being returned to shelters because they do not match with potential owners
solution: Creating a process where Users can filter their lifestyle needs/wants in a pet
result: An app that matches Users with pets based on needs/wants and shows nearby locations all in one product, reducing the rate in which pets are returned to shelters

details.detail: was designed by animal lovers to eliminate the rate in which pets are returned to shelters.

of three weeks and using the design process, Peeps For Pets allows itâ€™s Users and Stakeholders to match pets with potential homes, communicate with one another, and schedule meetups in nearby locations.

title: Nourish
problem: Users have limited resources and knowledge to living and choosing sustainably that could deeply impact the environment
solution: A process in which Users can learn about sustainable living and choose sustainable products from their favorite stores
result: An app that allows its Users to be informed, shop their favorites stores, find sustainable products, and purchase them all in one place.

details.detail: was developed to allow Users a way to sustainably shop at their favorite stores on one platform.

brainstorming, and testing, this project allows its Users to browse, filter, favorite, check out, and choose a pickup location in the app.  It also features a greenscore on products and how to have a more sustainable living.
